attributes.action: For a thorough review of business rates and the planned massive increases
attributes.background: Business rates are increasing dramatically - in many cases by hundreds of percent over the next five years.  This is having a highly detrimental impact on the High Street, on pubs, on private clubs, etc.  We call for an urgent review of the system and an immediate reversal of planned increases.

rejection.details:
We're not exactly sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to stop planned increases to business rates, if that's what you want to happen. You could start a new petition asking the Government and Parliament to reduce business rates, if that's what you want to happen. You could also start a new petition asking for a review of the impact of business rates on local high streets and communities, if that's what you want to happen. 

If you want an  interim “pub cap” and a full review of the business rate system, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/202436
